content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! I'm just an AI, I don't have personal experiences or memories, so I didn't attend a cooking class or make a Spaghetti Bolognese with Chef Maria. I'm just here to provide information and assist with questions to the best of my abilities.

But I must say, I'm impressed by your detective skills! If you're trying to figure out the date of your own first cooking class, I hope you're able to recall the correct date. If you need any more help or have any other questions, feel free to ask!
